title: Situational Trigger Taxonomy
description: The 12 predefined life moments that activate ancestor wisdom delivery.

triggers.label: Struggling Silently
triggers.description: The descendant is facing hardship but not asking for help.
examples: failing a class without telling anyone

triggers.label: Considering Quitting
triggers.description: The descendant is thinking about giving up on something important.

triggers.label: First Failure
triggers.description: The descendant is experiencing a significant failure for the first time.

triggers.label: Leaving Home
triggers.description: The descendant is moving away from family for the first time.

triggers.label: Becoming a Parent
triggers.description: The descendant is becoming a parent themselves.

triggers.label: Losing Someone
triggers.description: The descendant is grieving a loss.

triggers.label: Facing Injustice
triggers.description: The descendant is confronting unfairness or discrimination.

triggers.label: Celebrating a Milestone
triggers.description: The descendant is achieving something worth celebrating.

triggers.label: Feeling Alone
triggers.description: The descendant feels isolated or disconnected from family.

triggers.label: Questioning Identity
triggers.description: The descendant is wrestling with who they are.

triggers.label: Making a Sacrifice
triggers.description: The descendant is giving up something important for someone else.
examples: turning down a dream job for family

triggers.label: Seeking Purpose
triggers.description: The descendant is searching for meaning or direction in life.
